# <a name="create-an-email-signature-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="b1d2e-102">Créer une signature électronique dans Outlook sur le Web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1d2e-102">Create an email signature in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="b1d2e-103">Accédez à</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1d2e-103">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="b1d2e-104">**Paramètres**  >  **Afficher tous les paramètres Outlook**  >  **Composition et réponse**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1d2e-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Compose and reply**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="b1d2e-105">Sous **signature de courrier électronique**, tapez votre signature et utilisez les options de mise en forme disponibles pour modifier son apparence.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1d2e-105">Under **Email signature**, type your signature and use the available formatting options to change its appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b1d2e-106">*Remarque :* Vous ne pouvez avoir qu’une seule signature par compte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1d2e-106">*Note:* You can have only one signature per account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b1d2e-107">Pour en savoir plus, consultez [la rubrique créer et ajouter une signature électronique dans Outlook sur le Web](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b1d2e-107">To learn more, see [Create and add an email signature in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span></span>
